name: Acoustic report
description: A report measuring the noise environment for a new development or its effect within a proposed development

name: Affordable housing statement
description: This statement should set out how the development scheme will comply with the local authorityâ€™s  affordable housing policy

name: Air quality assessment (AQA)
description: An assessment of the impact on air quality around the development and during the construction phase

name: Arboricultural impact assessment
description: A supporting report from an arboriculturist for any proposed work on trees - providing detail on the conditions of the trees on or next to the development site

name: Archaeological assessment
description: An evaluation to identify and assess the potential of an area to contain as-yet unrecorded archaeological sites

name: Biodiversity survey and report
description: Information on biodiversity interests and protected species and any possible impacts on them from the development, plus details of any measures proposed to mitigate or compensate for the impacts

name: Community Infrastructure Levy (CIL) Form
description: A form that must be completed to determine whether the development is subject to a CIL payment

name: Condition of Trees
notes: Covers if tree is diseased, at risk of breaking or falling

name: Daylight and sunlight assessment
description: An assessment to evaluate the potential impact of a proposed development on the amount of natural light received by surrounding properties

name: Design and access statement
description: A report accompanying and supporting a planning application that explains how a proposed development is a suitable response to the site and its setting, and demonstrates that it can be adequately accessed by prospective users

name: Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA)
notes: Required if the site exceeds certain thresholds or is near sensitive areas re onshore extraction of oil and gas

name: Environmental Statement
notes: Required by Development relating to the onshore extraction of oil and gas applications

name: Hydrocarbon Licence
description: Proof of exploration rights from North Sea Transition Authority (NSTA)

name: Land Contamination Assessment
description: Report on potential land contamination issues
notes: Needed if the site is known or suspected to be contaminated.

name: Location Plan
description: A location plan that shows the application site in relation to the surrounding area

name: Noise and Traffic Assessment
description: Evaluates operational impact on surrounding communities

name: Schedule of Works
notes: required by Camden for all lbc applications

name: Site Plan
description: A site plan that shows the proposed development in relation to the site boundaries and other existing buildings
notes: general requirement. For extraction of oil and gas needs to Needed to show site layout, access, and safety zones

name: Site Restoration Plan
notes: Required under UK planning conditions to ensure post-production remediation

name: Sketch Plan
description: Often a plan showing the position of the trees listed in an application

name: Structural Damage Report
notes: Mentioned in "Trees - Addtional information" section of tree works form

name: Subsidence Report
description: A report by an engineer or surveyor describing damage, vegetation, soil, roots, and repair proposals
